Hero.headline: Germany's Premium Infrastructure for Direct Sales
Hero.subline: We scale sales organizations for energy and telecommunication leaders. Compliant. Data-driven. Certified.

Mission.headline: Our Standard
Mission.text1: We are professionalizing direct sales. We replace 'sales pressure' with 'expert consultation', building long-term value for our partners.
Mission.text2: Our mission is to establish the most structured sales organization in Germany, driven by integrity, training, and transparency.

Vision.label: Future Focus
Vision.headline: Be Part of
Vision.text1: We are building a sales ecosystem where structure meets digital intelligence.
Vision.text2: Our vision is to become the primary infrastructure for Germany's telecommunication and energy sectors.

UberUns.label: Corporate Profile
UberUns.subtitle: ABOUT US
UberUns.headline: Structured Sales Operations
UberUns.text: Headquartered in <bold>Halle (Saale)</bold>, Aicitel is a strategic growth partner for DAX-listed companies and market challengers. We combine local focus with national ambition.

CareerOpportunities.label: Career Path
CareerOpportunities.headline: Build a Professional Career at
CareerOpportunities.subline: Join a structured environment where performance dictates your trajectory. Clear pathways. Defined standards.

BenefitsHighlight.card1Text: Your age doesn't matter. Your background doesn't matter. Only your adherence to standards and performance counts.
BenefitsHighlight.card2Text: Daily coaching and access to our proprietary sales psychology curriculum.
BenefitsHighlight.card3Text: Transparent promotion path from Junior Sales to Management based on clear KPIs.
BenefitsHighlight.card4Text: Competitive base salary plus industry-leading commission packages.

EmployeeTestimonials.label: Our Standards
EmployeeTestimonials.headline: Leadership Principles
EmployeeTestimonials.t1Quote: We do not sell. We consult. Every interaction must add value to the customer and uphold the brand reputation of our partners.
EmployeeTestimonials.t2Quote: Good enough is not enough. We strive for perfection in compliance, presentation, and execution.
EmployeeTestimonials.t3Quote: We believe in continuous improvement. Our training systems are designed to build careers, not just jobs.

KurzErklaert.label: The Opportunity
KurzErklaert.headline: Why Top Talent
KurzErklaert.text: Aicitel is a specialized management consultancy for high-end sales solutions. We offer ambitious talents a structured career path to financial independence and executive responsibility.

MentoringDetails.block1Text: Success leaves clues. You will be paired with a Senior Mentor who has walked the path before you. Daily feedback loops ensure you improve 1% every day.
MentoringDetails.block2Text: Access to our digital learning platform and weekly workshops on negotiation, psychology, and leadership.

EmployeeSuccess.headline: Proven Career Tracks
EmployeeSuccess.text: Our management structure is built on merit. We promote from within based on operational excellence.

ProductPartner.label: B2B Solutions
ProductPartner.headline: Scale Your Customer Acquisition
ProductPartner.text: Stop relying on unpredictable marketing channels. Our direct sales force delivers guaranteed interactions and signed contracts with high lifetime value.
ProductPartner.card1Text: Deploy certified agents to new regions with standardized onboarding.
ProductPartner.card2Text: Compliance-first approach ensuring your brand is represented perfectly.
ProductPartner.card3Text: Variable cost model. You pay for results, not just hours.

FAQPage.metaDescription: Common questions about working with and at Aicitel.
FAQPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQPage.q1: How does the commission structure work?
FAQPage.a1: We offer an industry-leading model with a solid base salary plus uncapped commissions. High achievers regularly exceed industry standards.
FAQPage.q2: Do you require previous sales experience?
FAQPage.a2: No. We hire for attitude and train for skill. Our academy will teach you everything you need to know.
FAQPage.q3: How quickly can we deploy a team?
FAQPage.a3: For partners, we can typically mobilize a dedicated sales squad of 5-10 agents within 2-3 weeks.
FAQPage.a4: We specialize in direct sales, which includes residential (D2D), retail, and event sales. It is the most effective channel for complex products.
FAQPage.a5: We focus on quality over quantity. Our agents are heavily trained in consultation, not high-pressure tactics, ensuring lower churn rates.

Legal.privacyGeneralText: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this data protection declaration.
Legal.privacyRightsIntro: You can exercise the following rights at any time using the contact details provided by our data protection officer:
Legal.privacyRight1: Information about your data stored by us and its processing (Art. 15 GDPR),
Legal.privacyRight2: Correction of incorrect personal data (Art. 16 GDPR),
Legal.privacyRight3: Deletion of your data stored by us (Art. 17 GDPR),
Legal.privacyRight4: Restriction of data processing if we are not yet allowed to delete your data due to legal obligations (Art. 18 GDPR),
Legal.privacyRight5: Objection to the processing of your data by us (Art. 21 GDPR) and
Legal.privacyRight6: Data portability, provided you have consented to data processing or have concluded a contract with us (Art. 20 GDPR).
